attributes.action: A vote of Incompetence in the current government.
attributes.additional_details:
Give the public a vote the country is in crisis and the government are not acknowledging it.
They spin and and deny anything is wrong.
There is more interest in keeping their jobs. Than keeping us safe.
attributes.background:
It is time to change the government. 
They are failing on.
NHS
Social Care
Avoiding dealing with pay issues. Hiding under the premise of pay review bodies.
Wasting money on HS2.
Wasted money on PPE contracts.
Not answering questions correctly.

Over all incompetence.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Your petition refers to a "vote of incompetence" in the current Government, but it's not clear what you actually want to happen.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
